text: Joseph Blatchford (born June 7, 1934) was the third Director of the United States Peace Corps. Blatchford was appointed Peace Corps Director in 1969 by President Richard Nixon. He retired 1971. Blatchford was born in Milwaukee, Wisconsin. He was raised in Beverly Hills, California. ==Other websites== * An Interview with Joseph Blatchford Peace Corps Volunteer magazine. May, 1970 Pages 5-13 * Peace Corps News Clips about Joseph Blatchford Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:American civil servants Category:People from Milwaukee Category:People from Beverly Hills, California
title: Joseph Blatchford
